data.text:
My mom and I (and 2 of the furballs) took a quick trip to ME, NH, and VT. It was a bittersweet getaway as we made some of my dad's favorite stops. 
The pups took their own version of a  #cityhallselfie in @townofconway after hiking @WhiteMountainNF. https://t.co/qeVxMW16Z9
RT @PhilKiraly: Just a few folks out there taking a @CityHallSelfie in the  @VGlencoe Village Hall #pollinatorgarden... @ILCMA @ELGL50 @ICMA

I wouldn‚Äôt dream of leaving this little gem out of the #CityHallSelfie collection today. Built in 1727, this was the @TownofMHD Town Hall until it was replaced by Abbot Hall circa 1876 üá∫üá∏ https://t.co/21h0fTKpM7

The tower is so tall on @Gloucester_MA 2nd empire brick city hall built in 1870, I spotted her from out in the harbor and had to solicit help from my Schooner Festival crew for this #CityHallSelfie to fit it all in https://t.co/LwQlmBPurK

tweets.text: Just a few folks out there taking a @CityHallSelfie in the  @VGlencoe Village Hall #pollinatorgarden... @ILCMA @ELGL50 @ICMA https://t.co/SM0Ab4vinf

The tower is so tall on @Gloucester_MA 2nd empire brick city hall built in 1870, I spotted her from out in the harbor and had to solicit help from my Schooner Festival crew for this #CityHallSelfie to fit it all in https://t.co/LwQlmBPurK

I wouldn‚Äôt dream of leaving this little gem out of the #CityHallSelfie collection today. Built in 1727, this was the @TownofMHD Town Hall until it was replaced by Abbot Hall circa 1876 üá∫üá∏ https://t.co/21h0fTKpM7

Very excited to share our #CityHallSelfie wrap video! Took awhile, since we WERE a runner-up for most selfies by one person... üòè 
Thanks to our team and our community for a great showing, and thanks to @ELGL50 for inspiring and promoting joy!
https://t.co/QQUSmsKLXR

The Village's pollinator garden is bringing in lots of new friends! ü¶ãüêù
If you have not seen the demonstrator garden that we put in on Village Hall grounds, we encourage you to check it out! 
#GlencoeIL #pollinators https://t.co/QsW2UUGoWZ
Congratulations GiGi! Nice photo of you and @EthanBakerMI in front of @CityTroyMI‚Äôs #cityhall. #cityhallselfie  #creditunionsrock https://t.co/qaXWivJ9PG

Gigi the Squishmallow is pleased to be #Troy's honorary Mayor for a Day, meeting Mayor Ethan Baker and sitting in on a City Council meeting. Gigi put forward a motion for everyone to eat mice for dinner every day‚Ä¶thankfully, it was not seconded. Donate: https://t.co/vPyRVZQUwr https://t.co/wGyhfW5EJ0
